hadith.text: It was narrated that Al-Hakam bin 'Utaibah said:"I heard Abu Juhaifah say: 'The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) set off at midday, during the time of intense heat' - (One of the narrators) Ibn Al-Muthanna said, to Al-Batha' - and he performed Wudu', and prayed Zuhr, two Rak'ahs, and 'Asr, two Rak'ahs, with a short spear ('Anzah) in front of him
